courses.Title: Graphic Design
courses.Description: Learn the fundamentals of graphic design.
Topics: Using Online graphic design tools (Canva & Figma)
Logo Design in Illustrator and other platforms

courses.Title: Google Tools
courses.Description: Master Google tools for productivity and collaboration.
Topics: Preparing a Professional report in Google Docs from scratch, using Automatic Table of contents, page numbers, references, images, etc.
Practical Comparison between Google Docs & MS Word.
Simple functions in Google Sheets (Sum, Average, Multiply, ...)
Practical comparison between Google Sheets & MS Excel.
Preparing a professional presentation using Google Slides.
Practical Comparison between Google Slides & MS Powerpoint.
Using Google Drive to backup/store your important files.
How to create professional email signatures using GMAIL.
How to secure your emails from hackers - Best practices.
How to use templates. - Create resumes, CV, etc.
The Best Way to send large files via email (+other alternatives).

courses.Title: Website Design
Topics: Understanding the basics of web development
Working with HTML tags and elements
Creating forms and handling user input
Basics of CSS for styling web pages
Building a Website using CMS (e.g. Wordpress)
Basics of web hosting and domains

courses.Title: Advanced Web App
courses.Description: Build advanced web applications with modern frameworks.

courses.Title: Mobile App - Android, iOS
courses.Description: Develop mobile applications for Android and iOS.
Topics: Working with Local Databases in Flutter
Creating a Simple CRUD Mobile App
Error Handling and Logging in Flutter
Build Apps that work on both Apple and Android
